short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get notified when someone in your custom list has started livestream on Twitch

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Manage your streamer list to be informed when a streamer launches a live stream.

When the extension is installed, a Twitch connection window opens, please accept it, otherwise the extension won't work.

Feedback on my Github or Twitter.
https://twitter.com/Zaekof
https://github.com/loicngr/NotifyMeTTV
